TEST_NAME: Create buttons should be styled in a consistent way
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aapb.button_action_code = 'REDIRECT_PAGE'
            then case when aapb.button_template != 'Icon'
                      then 'N' 
                      when aapb.button_template_options != '#DEFAULT#:t-Button--noUI'
                      then 'N' 
                      when aapb.button_is_hot = 'No'
                      then 'N' 
                      when aapb.icon_css_classes != 'fa-plus'
                      then 'N' 
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn, 
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Misconfigured `create` button [button_template: `%0`, button_template_options: `%1`, button_is_hot: `%2`, icon_css_classes: `%3`, button_action_code: `%4`]',
              p0=> aapb.button_template,
              p1=> aapb.button_template_options,
              p2=> aapb.button_is_hot,
              p3=> aapb.icon_css_classes,
              p4=> aapb.button_action_code
            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Misconfigured `create` button (app %0, page %1, button id %2)',
												 p0 => aapb.application_id, 
       						       p1 => aapb.page_id,
												 p2 => aapb.button_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_template,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.icon_css_classes,
       aapb.button_action_code,
       aapb.redirect_url,
       aapb.label,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and lower(aapb.label) like 'create%'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
EXPLANATION:
Create buttons should be styled in a particular way:

*   The button template is 'Icon'
*   the style should be 'Remove UI Decoration'
*   it should not be hot
*   should have the icon Â 'fa-plus'
